医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
QIAGEN 获得 FDA 批准 NeuMoDx CT/NG 检测可用于 NeuMoDx 96 和 288 分子系统NeuMoDx CT/NG 检测旨在提高美国性传播感染 (STI) 检测的可及性、可负担性和及时性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/QIAGEN-receives-FDA-clearance-of-NeuMoDx-CTNG-Assay-for-use-on-both-NeuMoDx-96-and-288-Molecular-系统.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/QIAGEN-receives-FDA-clearance-of-NeuMoDx-CTNG-Assay-for-use-on-both-NeuMoDx-96-and-288-Molecular-系统.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0cbbe675-206a-4312-9369-221ecb4cf920 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 08:01:00 -0500 QIAGEN receives FDA clearance of NeuMoDx CT/NG Assay for use on both NeuMoDx 96 and 288 Molecular Systems
标志着 Vertex 和 Charles River 的重要里程碑Charles River 孟菲斯工厂获准生产 Vertex 的 CASGEVY ™疗法，这是世界上第一个针对严重镰状细胞病的基因编辑疗法https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Marking-a-vital-milestone-for-Vertex-and-Charles-River.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Marking-a-vital-milestone-for-Vertex-and-Charles-River.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2052a99c-e4ac-48cc-9b9d-705fb0c28937 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 07:58:00 -0500 Marking a vital milestone for Vertex and Charles River
TTP 公司 Cellular Origins 成立了由全球行业领导者组成的顾问委员会来自 CGT 和机器人行业的知名专家 John Campbell 教授、Matthew Li 博士、Paul Roberts 博士和 Geoffrey Hodge 被任命提供战略和技术观点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Cellular-Origins-a-TTP-Company-builtes-Advisory-Board-of-global-industry-leaders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Cellular-Origins-a-TTP-Company-builtes-Advisory-Board-of-global-industry-leaders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6061a4d-f5d5-44c2-a9b0-4ecdfb4668af Tue, 09 Jan 2024 07:55:00 -0500 Cellular Origins, a TTP Company, establishes Advisory Board of global industry leaders
创新的可穿戴设备让我们得以一睹持续、不引人注目的健康监测可穿戴传感器发展的最新进展和障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Innovative-wearables-offer-glimpse-into-continuous-unobtrusive-health-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Innovative-wearables-offer-glimpse-into-continuous-unobtrusive-health-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=410fd16d-60a8-405e-aed1-82663e1e4b79 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 07:22:00 -0500 Innovative wearables offer glimpse into continuous, unobtrusive health monitoring
研究人员使用柔软的可穿戴机器人帮助帕金森患者行走而不会被冻僵研究人员证明了软体机器人服装在避免帕金森病 (PD) 患者的冻结步态 (FoG) 方面的有效性，展示了其活动能力和步态质量的显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Researchers-use-a-soft-wearable-robot-to-help-a-person-living-with-Parkinsone28099s-walk-without-freezing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Researchers-use-a-soft-wearable-robot-to-help-a-person-living-with-Parkinsone28099s-walk-without-freezing.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8fc113e-73e4-4e4e-8204-0a5851ecee25 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 07:05:00 -0500 Researchers use a soft, wearable robot to help a person living with Parkinson’s walk without freezing
最大规模的妊娠糖尿病遗传学研究发现九个新的遗传区域与严重和常见的妊娠并发症有关研究人员通过全基因组关联研究 ((GWAS) 调查了妊娠糖尿病 (GDM) 的遗传基础及其与 2 型糖尿病 (T2D) 的关系，识别了不同和共有的遗传因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Largest-genic-study-of-gestational-diabetes-discovers-nine-novel-genic-regions-linked-to-severe-and-common-pregnancy-并发症.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Largest-genic-study-of-gestational-diabetes-discovers-nine-novel-genic-regions-linked-to-severe-and-common-pregnancy- complication.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ffaaf11-cc7b-4510-bff5-52d58c498caf Tue, 09 Jan 2024 06:50:00 -0500 Largest genetic study of gestational diabetes discovers nine novel genetic regions linked to severe and common pregnancy complication

在生育中心就诊的女性中，孕产妇压力与怀孕期间的血糖水平有关吗？一项新的研究探讨了在生育中心治疗期间与血糖水平相关的压力，因为这可能会影响受孕率和怀孕成功率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Is-maternal-stress-linked-with-blood-glucose-levels-during-pregnancy-among-women-attending-a-fertility-center.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Is-maternal-stress-linked-with-blood-glucose-levels-during-pregnancy-among-women-attending-a-fertility-center.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1edc33f5-82d7-493b-8b9f-132c25d9fd02 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 06:00:00 -0500 Is maternal stress associated with blood glucose levels during pregnancy among women attending a fertility center?
不断上升的医疗事故保费使小型诊所无法为未成年人提供性别肯定的护理爱荷华州立法者今年 3 月通过了一项禁止对未成年人提供性别肯定护理的禁令后，位于伊利诺伊州莫林州界线对面的一家 LGBTQ+ 健康诊所的管理人员决定开始提供这种护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Rising-malpractice-premiums-price-small-clinics-out-of-gender-affirming-care-for-minors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Rising-malpractice-premiums-price-small-clinics-out-of-gender-affirming-care-for-minors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92a6beee-0a24-4a9e-896b-ba3214f7ea58 Tue, 09 Jan 2024 05:59:03 -0500 Rising malpractice premiums price small clinics out of gender-affirming care for minors
戒烟管理的电子健康干预措施有效吗？电子健康干预措施对吸烟者戒烟管理的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Do-e-health-interventions-for-smoking-cessation-management-work.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240109/Do-e-health-interventions-for-smoking-cessation-management-work.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71578a9e-5e2c-4d0e-9916-3e069ec48adc Tue, 09 Jan 2024 05:45:00 -0500 Do e-health interventions for smoking cessation management work?
